description:
Do you have the skills to save a life?

Of course you do!

Saving a life is easy, all you need to know are a few simple techniques!

Save a life in 1 hour, is a course taught by real Australian paramedics, the experts in prehospital care. By the end of this course you will know exactly how to act in a life threatening situation.

You will be taught in a simple, easy to follow manner, meaning that anyone can take part. Each section consists of a interactive video, an information pack to further your knowledge and a quick quiz to ensure solid understanding of each topic.

Emergencies happen without warning. Let us teach you how to act in any emergency situation.
title: First Aid: Save a life in 1 hour
